snippet: Antitrust regulators should scrutinize a merger that could hurt consumers.
abstract: Editorial warns merger between American Airlines and US Airways could hurt consumers by forcing fares to rise, eliminating competition on certain flights and allowing combined airline to control nearly all flights at large airports; urges antitrust regulators to closely scrutinize deal rigorously and thwart possible damage to competition.
lead_paragraph: Antitrust regulators should scrutinize a merger that could hurt consumers.
